biotools.summary: A fully automated service which can be applied on any kind of tabular data (e.g. clinical) to automatically identify duplicated fields (lexically similar and/or highly correlated features), outliers, data inconsistencies. It can also deal with missing values through the application of data imputers.

bioschemas.name: Tabular Data Curator
bioschemas.summary: A fully automated service which can be applied on any kind of tabular data (e.g. clinical) to automatically identify duplicated fields (lexically similar and/or highly correlated features), outliers, data inconsistencies. It can also deal with missing values through the application of data imputers.
